item.title: Chaos in Syria sparks fears of ISIS prison breaks as US rushes detainees to Iraq
item.description: Syria chaos sparks ISIS security crisis as 150 detainees relocated to Iraq amid prison breaks. Kurdish forces withdraw from detention facilities.

item.title: Trump pushes ‘Trump-a-palooza’ midterm convention as GOP braces for tough elections
item.description: Republicans make history as the RNC greenlights a first-ever midterm convention to boost Trump and GOP candidates ahead of crucial 2024 presidential e...

item.title: GOP Rep Gonzales says video of kids exposes Dem ‘grandstanding’ over conditions at Texas ICE facility
item.description: Rep. Tony Gonzales shared a video of a Texas ICE facility showing children with computers, countering Democratic claims of "cages" and poor conditions...

item.title: Reporter's Notebook: Clinton contempt vote gains steam as Democrats join GOP in Epstein probe standoff
item.description: House committee refers Bill and Hillary Clinton for contempt of Congress charges for allegedly failing to comply with Epstein investigation subpoenas.

item.title: Post-Roe battle over abortion pills reaches Kentucky gas stations as AG opens investigation
item.description: Abortion laws continue evolving across states since the Supreme Court's 2022 Dobbs decision overturned Roe v. Wade, with trigger laws taking effect.
